component.name: createAdGroup
component.description: This endpoint allows you to create a new Ad Group within a campaign.

component.name: createAdvertiser
component.description: Create a new advertiser entity with the necessary details for attribution and domain address.

component.name: createBidList
component.description: Create a bid list, returning the created bid list.

component.name: createCampaign
component.description: Create a new campaign entity with the necessary details such as name, budget, and start date.

component.name: createCreative
component.description: Create a new creative under an advertiser.

component.name: createFrequencyConfiguration
component.description: Creates a frequency configuration, associating entities to increment the counter and applying the frequency configuration to bid lists.

component.name: createIpTargetingList
component.description: Create a new IP Targeting List for an advertiser. Each Advertiser has a quota for the number of IP targeting ranges they may include across all of their IP Targeting Lists.

component.name: generateForecast
component.description: Generate a forecast based on the data available at the time of the request.

component.name: getAdvertiserById
component.description: Get details of an existing advertiser using the advertiser's platform ID.

component.name: getAdvertiserOverview
component.description: Retrieve an overview of an advertiser, including descendant relationships for campaigns, ad groups, and creatives.

component.name: getCampaignMetrics
component.description: Retrieve the performance metrics for a campaign, including spend, impressions, and other key metrics.

component.name: getFirstPartyDataForAdvertisers
component.description: Retrieve the First Party Data matching the provided query for an advertiser.

component.name: getReportScheduleById
component.description: Retrieve details of a report schedule by its ID.

component.name: getTrackingTagById
component.description: Retrieve a tracking tag by its ID.

component.name: querySellers
component.description: Retrieve a paged, filterable list of sellers, seller domains, and whether they can be targeted as a SellerDomain in a bid list. Only returns sellers that have spent through our platform.
